channel.title: Fatal Error 317 client
channel.description:
Hello !
Everytime when i Run client on my server it crashes (client crashes). It happens just on 317 (any moparscape 317 server), 508 works fine. Here's screenshot of my fatal error, please help if you know what's wrong. And im using Windows 7 , it's never happened on XP.
[URL=http://img12.imageshack.us/i/errorvt.png/][IMG]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/4855/errorvt.png[/img][/URL]
